spiffyhud.edit_hud.desc:
Customize In-Game HUD

This button is bound to FancyMenu's menu bar.
You can hide it by hiding the menu bar.
spiffyhud.elements.dummy.title: Title
spiffyhud.elements.dummy.subtitle: Subtitle
spiffyhud.elements.slot.desc:
Displays the item in the given inventory slot
or the selected hotbar slot item.
spiffyhud.elements.slot.slot_id_help.tex:
^^^

# Important Slot IDs for the Player Inventory
 
 
## Hotbar

 - **Slot IDs:** 0 to 8
 - The first hotbar slot is 0.

## Main Inventory

  - **Slot IDs:** 9 to 35
  - The top-left main inventory slot is 9.

## Armor Slots

  - **Slot IDs:** 36 to 39
  - 36 (boots), 37 (leggings), 38 (chestplate), 39 (helmet)

## Offhand Slot

  - **Slot ID:** 40
 
 
![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Keksuccino/Spiffy-HUD/refs/heads/main/mod_resources/inv_slots_1.20.1_small.png)

^^^
spiffyhud.elements.dummy.display.cant_mo:
You can't move Vanilla HUD elements!
Delete the Vanilla element and add a Vanilla-like custom one instead!
spiffyhud.placeholders.camera_rotation_x: Returns the camera X rotation as value between -180.0 and 180.0 (degrees).
spiffyhud.placeholders.camera_rotation_y: Returns the camera Y rotation as value between -180.0 and 180.0 (degrees).
spiffyhud.placeholders.camera_rotation_d:
Displays the raw change in camera pitch (X axis)
between ticks as a decimal value.
The value may be positive or negative.

Displays the raw change in camera yaw (Y axis)
between ticks as a decimal value.
The value may be positive or negative.
spiffyhud.placeholders.player_position_d:
Displays the change in player position along
the X axis between ticks as a decimal value.
The value can be positive or negative.

Displays the change in player position along
the Y axis between ticks as a decimal value.
The value can be positive or negative.

Displays the change in player position along
the Z axis between ticks as a decimal value.
The value can be positive or negative.
spiffyhud.placeholders.player_item_use_p:
Returns the current item use progress of the player.
This is, for example, the progress of eating food,
drinking a potion, drawing a bow, etc.
The returned value is a decimal between 0.0 (0%) and 1.0 (100%).
spiffyhud.requirements.is_player_using_i:
Returns true when the player is using an item.
Using an item means, for example, eating food,
drinking a potion, drawing a bow, etc.
spiffyhud.elements.player.desc: Mirrors the client player like in the Inventory screen.
spiffyhud.elements.overlay_remover.desc:
Lets you remove different types of HUD overlays,
like the pumpkin overlay, powder snow overlay or the vignette.
spiffyhud.elements.overlay_remover.overl: Sets the overlay type the element should remove.
spiffyhud.elements.chat_customizer.desc: Allows you to customize some parts of the chat.
spiffyhud.elements.chat_customizer.input: Set Custom Input Field Background Color [HEX]
spiffyhud.elements.chat_customizer.corne: In which screen corner the chat should get rendered.
spiffyhud.elements.player_nbt_helper.des:
This element doesn't do anything really.
It's just a lazy way to implement something
that lets you see all NBT data paths
of the client player, to use them for
the "Player NBT Data" placeholder.
spiffyhud.elements.player_nbt_helper.pat: List With ALL Player NBT Data Paths
spiffyhud.placeholders.player_nbt_data.d:
Gets an NBT data value from the player.
Uses NBT data paths to get the value.
To see a list of all NBT data paths, please
add an "Player NBT Helper" element to your layout.
spiffyhud.elements.single_line_text.desc:
A simple single-line text that supports
Minecraft's JSON component text system.
That's the system used for the /tellraw command,
so you can simply use a /tellraw online generator
to generate text that should get displayed.
spiffyhud.placeholders.action_bar_messag:
Gets the current action bar message (the text above the hotbar).
Returns an empty text when no action bar message is displayed.
spiffyhud.placeholders.slot_item_display: Gets the display name of an item in a specific slot.
spiffyhud.placeholders.action_bar_messag:
The time left in ticks that the original Vanilla
action bar message gets displayed.
spiffyhud.placeholders.highlighted_item_:
The time left in ticks that the original Vanilla
highlighted item's name gets displayed above the hotbar.
